AI in Education.description: Applications of Data Science and Machine Learning in Educational Contexts, focusing on Large Language Models as tools for educational research

Mathematics Education.description: Research on teaching and learning mathematics, particularly focusing on geometry education and teacher preparation.

Educational Assessment.description: Quantitative Survey Methodologies for Educational Assessment, focusing on psychometric approaches and instrument development

Learning Analytics.description: Analysis of educational data to understand and improve learning processes, with a focus on writing and curriculum analysis.

STEM Education.description: Research in STEM education with a focus on mathematics education and teacher preparation
